com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.phone

Class MediaOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.phone.MediaOption

  • public class MediaOption
extends java.lang.Object
    A data type represents the media options of a call.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Method Summary

      Constructs an audio only media option.

      • hasVideo

        public boolean hasVideo()
        Whether video is enabled.
        Returns:
        False if neither local or remote video is enabled. Otherwise, true.
        Since:
        0.1

      • hasSharing

        public boolean hasSharing()
        Whether content sharing is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if content sharing is enabled. Otherwise, false.
        Since:
        1.3.0
